website_summaries.verdict: The Nexus 10's durable design, consistent updates, and good performance make it one of the best Android tablets to date.
pros: The Nexus 10 has a beautifully sharp screen
It's light, durable, and receives regular OS updates
Photo Sphere is an incredibly cool concept
Google's content ecosystem is only getting better
cons: The included charger isn't fast enough to power the battery while playing a game
even while idle, it charges painfully slowly.
There's no storage expansion option, and apps that take full advantage of the screen are currently few and far between.
Navigating isn't quite as seamless as on the Nexus 7

customer_reviews.title: really sad battery life
customer_reviews.text: this is a really sad device. I got it b/c I liked my nexus 7, and thought this would be just like it, only bigger. sooo wrong. battery dead in 4-5 hours, takes 12 hrs or more to recharge. even discharges rapidly in sleep mode. loaded only one game, volume off, Bluetooth off, screen at minimum brightness--there is no hope for it. continues to discharge even if you try to play plugged into wall socket. so if you think you're going to spend a lazy day on the couch with this puppy, think again. colors beautiful, display crisp, navigation good, etc, but...battery is garbage. so glad amazon let me return it. buy a Samsung 4.
customer_reviews.author: fern

customer_reviews.title: Best Tablet Today
customer_reviews.text: I had bought the Kindle HD 8.9 and I was not at all satisfied. Disappointed, I had to try the Nexus 10 and... WOW!!! A huge difference. If you are looking for overall quality at a good price, this is this tablet. The ppi on this thing is simple amazing for reading, video, or gaming. All this and cost less than the competition? I would give it six star if I can. Better than the competitions (as of today): *resolution 2560 x 1600 pixels *300 ppi *1080 HD camcorder *9000 mAh battery *No need for commercial lock screen *Pure Android with most recent OS update *Price **PRICE** **PRICE**
customer_reviews.author: Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Pogo cable too
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot for light surfing in bed, I don't use it for too much else. You MUST get a Pogo cable for charging- it's just so convenient. I compared this to a Samsung tablet before buying as I have a Samsung phone, and what really drew me to the Nexus is it doesn't have all the Samsung useless software on it. My next phone may be a Nexus for that reason. I also get all the updates as soon as they are available because a 3rd party doesn't have to shoehorn them into their proprietary Android version.
customer_reviews.author: Vance's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was anxious about this purchase--I'm usually an Apple guy, and with the Nexus 10 being so significantly cheaper, I thought I'd be getting what I paid for and would have a tablet that didn't stack up to the others in the market. But this one is quick, has a GREAT resolution, is very intuitive, and has the best speakers that I've heard on any tablet. DEFINITELY got my money's worth. Sometimes the tablet struggles to connect to WiFi when we're out at new places, but that's rare. My only complaint is that Chrome doesn't have Ad Block for their tablet browser, but other than that, I'm very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect device for digital comics and streaming video.
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet. Got it originally just to have something to read digital comics on. The various apps for that work great and the tablet is a perfect size to serve as a digital comic platform. In addition this has largely replaced my laptop as the main portable movie/tv viewing device. It works amazingly well for that as well. As a casual user I 100% recommend this. Not entirely sure I'd actually recommend it as a primary computer though. I'm sure it would work fine, but it wouldn't be my first choice. It's not quite powerful enough for that.
customer_reviews.author: Seangreyson

customer_reviews.title: Pure Google goodness
customer_reviews.text: I was opposed to getting a ten inch tablet due to the size. But I owned every Nexus device ever made except this one one. So I ordered it and it is a nice mix between my Nexus 7's and my Alienware 14. The front facing speakers and screen really make this tablet shine. With a few simple tweaks navigation and typing with a large tablet is actually easier then my Nexus 7's. This tablet maybe over a year old in specs but nothing can compete with it for price,speed and screen.
customer_reviews.author: Nexus Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet and my parents love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my parents who have never been on the Internet or had smart phones.... Needless to say, this was their first venture into modern technology. I was surprised how easily they picked up the Nexus. The tablet is intuitive, fast and has a great display. When comparing size and price to other tablets, I don't know how you beat the Nexus. One more plus with the Nexus is there is no bloatware loaded on the device.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M

customer_reviews.title: Breaks constantly
customer_reviews.text: Apparently this was a known issue from some time ago. The Tablet frequently just locks up and I have to hard reset the thing in order to use it again. Some people have tried turning off their Location Services and this solves the problem but not for me. Also I shouldn't have to use a workaround, gimping the functionality of my device in order to use it properly. When it works, it is a nice tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Issiyo

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is my first tablet (of any size) and it meets my expectation. The screen is super clear and crisp, auto update from Google is great and it's great for my intended use i.e. playing games, watching movies and youtube. Bad things: - the back side heats up quickly especially during game playing - it's a bit heavy - browsing is a bit of a problem, I still prefer browsing in PC Don't let the bad things prevent you from buying this though because it's more affordable compared to iPads and has superb specs.
customer_reviews.author: Doly

customer_reviews.title: This is what I was looking
customer_reviews.text: This Tablet is good overall. I used it mostly for Office, having my corporate email, personal email, opening an reviewing excel, word, powerpoint files. A lot of apps for business activities. Pros -Tons of apps -Work well for Business activities -Sharp screen -Good speed -Awesome camera Cons -Heavy -Hard to find accessories (I bought this in 2013) -Charging takes a life So if you are looking something for business go for it. ( I actually owned a Google Nexus 7 most for games)
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Nexus 10
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I got along without this tablet. I also bought a cover for it and find that very handy. the tablet is very easy to use, I have it synced with my PC, and probably use it 15 times a day. Easily check email, look up all those things I wonder about and never took the time to look up before. I also use it to connect YouTube to my TV -- great tablet and great price !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This Google Nexus 10 is really great the look feel.. beautiful piece of technology at the palm of ur hands.. lol. should have gotten the 32GB.. but its really great.. bought it brand new original boxing, great packaging.. i would definitely recommend this.. but please people be careful and not get too excited and download a set of apps.. overloadin the processor and gettin viruses isnt nice..
customer_reviews.author: Dayne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful device
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for business, for presenting images and documents to prospective clients. Converting Powerpoint or Word files to PDFs worked well. There are apps for opening and turning the pages of PDFs. Image and letter quality is excellent - the precision of the screen. I was amazed and pleased. It also lets you check emails - very useful. Otherwise I am just learning all the other features available. As for physical appearance and feel, also very impressive. This is a good looking, professional sleek device. The iPad has nothing on it, in my opinion. Black is as good or better, again in my opinion. I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Bx

customer_reviews.title: torched battery
customer_reviews.text: I expected the battery to be bad. So I bought a replacement. Now it works like new.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not available with KitKat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this "new" tablet from Web Offers through Amazon expecting it to come with (or upgrade to) KitKat. It came with 4.2.2 and would not upgrade. Now Google tells me it's more than 15 months old so it's not qualified for an upgrade. I really feel deceived by Amazon and wondering where this tablet actually came from.
customer_reviews.author: John Grove

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, expensive
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet, feels very responsive, and very future-proof with the retina-like display with an amazing PPI, great hardware specs and, being a Nexus product, it will always be updated with every new Android version Google releases. I didn't like paying so much for it, but, right now, it's the best 10" Android tablet out there. One very minor thing I didn't like about it is having the charging USB port on the left side of the tablet (in landscape mode), next to the headphone jack, instead of on the right. It's no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Google Nexus 10 is sweet
customer_reviews.text: Awesome screen, very convienent for email and surfing. Tons of apps. Made for Google, supported well. Get it, you'll like it . ;) Update: Not so well supported, android sys updates stopped at ver 5.1.1 Pad performance has diminished.It now has issues when connecting for a charge when off and wifi reception was reduced by updates. took away a star for that reason ...
customer_reviews.author: ak_willy

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I had this exact model tablet, until it broke after three years of daily use. After that time, this was still just about the best Android tablet on the market. The screen resolution, clarity, and brightness are excellent, and the applications run fast.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband who LOVEs it! I like that it has a built in rubberized backing to it, so it won't slip out of your hand. The screen is nice and bright. The product for the price is very nice. I did a lot of research comparing similar ones, and even though I know my husband isn't using it to it's fullest potential yet, it was highly rated, and that was important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Dollywalley

customer_reviews.title: I use this as a kitchen order display in a restaurant
customer_reviews.text: I run fresh kds on this in my restaurants kitchen. It works well. The employees tap the orders away when they are done.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I've owned many different tablets and this one is the best yet. Gets the newest updates, from Google, and has a great screen. Very fast processor runs everything I throw at it..Don't like the charger setup. The European ac adaptor is too flimsy. I'm going to modify it.
customer_reviews.author: jwahlund

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Pleased With Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Like other people here on the forums, I received the European model (with the European style charger) from Amazon when they fulfilled the order. However, Amazon including loose in the shipping box an adapter for the plug to allow me to use it in a standard US plug. Big plus to Amazon for recognizing the problem and addressing. The tablet itself is slightly bigger then I was expecting, but is extremely responsive and the native Chrome handles the internet much better then my android-esqe Kindle. I am disappointed there is no way to watch Amazon Prime on the Tablet, but as my purchase was for NFC development, I can say it meets my needs just fine.
customer_reviews.author: iGames

customer_reviews.title: Best Tablet!
customer_reviews.text: My wife had the Google Nexus 7, but needed a little more visual area. We opted for this unit, and I must say, it's the best I've ever seen. Speed, quality, quick charge time, dependability, and the screen resolution is perfection. So much better than iPad! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: First tablet.
customer_reviews.text: The Google Nexus 10 is my first tablet. I've only owned it about a month, but so far. I can't complain. The speakers sound good for what they are, and I like their placement. It feels good in my hand. Picture quality is great! It was pretty easy to start up right out of the box, and I had no difficulties connecting to my wifi, etc. As has been a complaint with this product before, it charges too slow with the charger that comes with it. This should have been addressed by now. Otherwise, I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: BSP II

customer_reviews.title: High performance tablet that get the updates as soon as they are released straight from Google.
customer_reviews.text: My wife is loving this tablet so far. It gets the updates straight from Google as soon as they are released.. That's a top reason to get a tablet like this and it's battery life is pretty good too. It's everything you would expect from a top of the line Android tablet.
customer_reviews.author: KE4RZ1

customer_reviews.title: this was my first android type tablet and I must ...
customer_reviews.text: this was my first android type tablet and I must say that I bought it around 2014 and It still works perfectly in 2017 so no complaints there.
customer_reviews.author: nichols nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Good, but.
customer_reviews.text: As iPhone users, we have found getting used to the idiosyncrasies of the Android system a bit of a learning curve. Despite the reputed advanced technology of this tablet, we would have been happier with a more familiar user interface.
customer_reviews.author: Russell J Hall

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with this tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite toy! I'm crazy about my Nexus 10 and how gorgeous it is. Great functionality, screen blows my brains, and the battery life is pretty damn impressive considering that. New best friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GoogleTablet
customer_reviews.text: SO fast! This was purchased to replace an old laptop on it's last leg. I was on the fence about getting a tablet vs. a new laptop and I'm extremely pleased. Will be very convenient to travel with as well...light and quick. does everything I need. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: June M

customer_reviews.title: I really love this little tablet
customer_reviews.text: I really love this little tablet. Too bad they do not make it anymore. So I am told. It is a great item. Works fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Good device - I'm very satisfied with the quality of that tablet
customer_reviews.text: In overall, I'm very satisfied with the quality of that tablet, got immediately 4.3 and 4.4 Android updates, amazing screen - competed to iPad 2 I use as well, Samsung did a good work for Google!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! the Best!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful amazing screen resolution, like no other tabler! Lightening fast processor, able to handle everything with ease. Speakers are great and play clearly and loud!! I feel is it a better choice than I pad!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina V.

customer_reviews.title: Google Nexus 10 (wi-fi only)
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing to compare this table to. This is our first. So far, it's just what we wanted. We're still poking around and learning more about it. Already we learned that 16 gigs are good, but MORE is always better. The voice to text is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: rlg

customer_reviews.title: pros yes. Con, yes.
customer_reviews.text: pros about android is a freedom apple cannot deliver. smooth and powerful Cons? more crashes, freezes and stuff. Not very often, but the you will notice the difference if you previously owned an ipad. overall very nice tablet. will recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: xinhezhu

customer_reviews.title: Googel Nexus 10
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Google Nexus 10 for my husband to travel overseas to Saudi Arabia. He has truly enjoyed having it in order to do face time, emails, etc. I chose it because of the many android apps that it has and the ease of using it and the size of the screen.
customer_reviews.author: rickettg

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: This larger screen is great for crosswords, weather radar, banking and the screen is easy to read. It is very easy to use. There is a lot to like about this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Brockmann fan

customer_reviews.title: An amazing tablet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent display ~ extremely clear pictures ~ my husband has an IPad Air and I think this tablet surpasses his in display and clarity of pictures. The only drawback is the time it takes to charge the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything else is great..
customer_reviews.text: Takes a long time to charge (at least over night if not longer). And, you can only use for about 3-4 hours before it will need a charge again. Everything else is great...
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wallace

customer_reviews.title: forget ipad
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before I bought. If your looking for something to watch movies on this is way to go! My mom has the newest iPad, and she was bragging about it. So I had to bring this thing over and show her. As soon as she saw the display she wanted to return her iPad! I love it great sound and display. Works lightning fast no troubles. I would recommend getting the pogo charger way faster charging. This thing does go through the battery if you have all the bells and whistles cranked up
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Step Up from Nexus 7
customer_reviews.text: I was one of the first to get a Nexus 7 and loved it, but because of the small screen size, sometimes it was a little hard to read. Old eyes, y'know... So I decided to get a Nexus 10 and there have been some major improvements. Boots and loads programs much faster, battery life is greatly improved and the screen is nice and bright with the larger size making for easy reading. So now the spouse - whose eyes are better - has got the 7 and I'm very happy with my new tablet. There is simply no need to spend more money for Brand A just for the logo on the back.
customer_reviews.author: The Black Cat

customer_reviews.title: great piece of technology especially if you're a college student ...
customer_reviews.text: Does everything i want it to do and more, great piece of technology especially if you're a college student and require something light. Only sad thing is the lack of flash player but that can be easily verified by downloading third party flash based browsers like puffin etc.
customer_reviews.author: kevin45

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything of the tablet, simple and practical design! great android updates and amazing screen and sound! Maybe I feel a little bit concerned by the lack of SD card, but in any other aspects is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Ilich

customer_reviews.title: Everything you want in an Android tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome display and graphics very fast smooth operation. Light weight, solidly built. All of the quality I have grown to expect from Samsung. Interfaces well with all Google apps and programs, both on my Galaxy S2, and my PCs.
customer_reviews.author: mike james

customer_reviews.title: Tablet HEAVEN
customer_reviews.text: Havent been able to utilize all aplications freely, but being an android guy I love the Operating system. Tablet is compact and the screen resolution is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Robin MacBride

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product, however if you don't have access to wi-fi you're out of luck. I knew that going in.so absolutely no product bashing here. For those of you who want access without wi-fi you really need to think your purchase out really well before buying. I have encountered on a number of occasions no wi-fi connection or no wi-fi connection without paying for the access. You may want to buy a product along with a plan from one of the wireless companies that offer tab access. Just my observation.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic tablet. 2GB of ram without a price increase of $100 for other Samsung tablets. The stock version of Android has a very clean feel in contrast to the very direct feel of carrier versions of the OS. Charges rather slowly but has an extremely long battery life. USB debug mode is extremely useful. I usually charge my phone during the day and the Nexus 10 at night and set my phone on the lowest brightness, power saver and clear the RAM. The gorilla glass has an almost rubberized feel very conducive to hand operation.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Wright

customer_reviews.title: Screen size is perfect and larger than most tablets
customer_reviews.text: Still use this tablet on a daily basis. Screen size is perfect and larger than most tablets.
customer_reviews.author: F. Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Nexus 10 easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Just got the Nexus 10, it works great I like the google maps feature better on this tablet then on the nexus 7 that I own, and the video streeming is clear perfect picture, This is a good tablet. If interested in just web brousing then the 16 gb would be the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: david n.

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet! It's really good performance and speed. What I love best is watching the videos in this tablet since the HD on this tablet is just amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: After a scary ordeal with it being delivered to the wrong house and that house trying to hide it, I got it! And it's just great. It's a bit heavier than I expected, but it's all so worth it. I'm so very pleased with this product that I bought another for my father for Father's Day. We're now a Google Nexus family. Woot!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Hwang

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: sounds great and colors are bright, my ipad looks ok but this is nicer in my opinion, has 2 speakers and 2 charging options.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: First, I have bought Nexus 7 for myself and almost completely switched to using it instead of laptop. Then I have bought Nexus 10 tablet for my 80 y.o. mother-in-law and so far, I think it was a very good choice. She never learned to use a computer, but training her to use tablet was made easier with Nexus 10: good size screen, wider margins are easier for holding. I also bought a case cover (i-BASON) that really made a difference to her - its wake-up feature, stand and stylus are big help to elderly beginners. Summary: my mother-in-law uses her Nexus 10 tablet every day and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: IRINA Y YAKOVENKO

customer_reviews.title: refurbished and excellent!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! I had my doubt's and read the few bad reviews but it works well, no issues yet, and the screen is absolutely amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: google nexus 10
customer_reviews.text: excellent screen size for me,battery life,screen display very vivid.highly recommend this tablet looked at buying a tablet for a long time this tablet is the best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Rita R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am totally satisfied with my choice of this tablet. I like the size, the weight, the sharp display. I have nothing negative to say about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: does not work
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months it does not boot. Samsung is useless with its help. Wish I never purschased!!!! They insist on ss numb but it cannot be seen unless it can boot.
customer_reviews.author: Onthewater

customer_reviews.title: Audio problems with Skype
customer_reviews.text: I have a Nexus 7 and it works great with Skype, but Nexus 10 and Skype is an issue. Either no audio at all or audio is choppy. This is a known issue with Nexus 10 and Skype. People also having problems with this product and Google Hangouts. I bought this primarily as a Skype platform so was not a good purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I bought this one. It now has Android 4.4.2 (latest one at the time of this review) and it works perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: A good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, it does tend to need a re-start fairly often. And,yes, charging takes a long time, but it lasts a long time when charged as well. Neither of these things has been too big a problem for me. A good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JMole

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price! Easy to use, easy to set up, Happy I bought it. I user it mostly for email and surfing the web
customer_reviews.author: A.T.

customer_reviews.title: A great item and just did not last
customer_reviews.text: Owned for four months and loved the device. Sadly it broke due to some software reason. Returned without an issue
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: simply amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought the nexus 10 and it's the best tablet I've ever had the pleasure of using. Fast easy to use and nice to look at. Feels natural when you hold it in landscape mode, light, thin and the colors are so crisp and clear on the screen. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Google Nexus 10
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loves his Google Nexus 10! I tease him that it is attached to his hand. He highly recommends.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the port is pretty shoddy to go bad that quickly
customer_reviews.text: This was a decent development device for several months, up until the micro-USB port got too loose to hold a connector. The quality of the port is pretty shoddy to go bad that quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Maltzen

customer_reviews.title: Google Nexus 10 (Wi-Fi only, 16GB)
customer_reviews.text: The resolution is beautiful, just like the reviews said. I like the landscape shape and the speakers in the front. Great notebook.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Love my Google Nexus Tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tablet! It's really fast and just does everything its supposed to really well. The screen size is perfect for movies and TV shows.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: sent back
customer_reviews.text: when writing text it blocks the area you are writing in, you need an external keyboard. I sent it back
customer_reviews.author: S. Prokop

customer_reviews.title: Great large format tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet. Looks amazing, performance is very good, and size/weight is surprisingly comfortable. It has no extra crap and cruft pre-installed like most other Android devices.
customer_reviews.author: wdjenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant screen, succesful UX design, acceptable camera, very responsive. Probably its a consequence of the CPU and GPU power so I might say it's a bit battery hungry. It's the first portable device I've owned that can drain more power than the charger provides when it's on charge. In the overall, I wouldnt even compare it to the "stylish" tablet from the fruit company.
customer_reviews.author: SAVAS MANYASLI

customer_reviews.title: Great product but terrible fulfillment on the part of Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: After two failed attempts I went out to buy a unit from a brick and mortar store. First delivery was a French version, the second was a German unit that had already been opened. From the looks of it I'm not the only one. Amazon distribution is having a problem getting it right.
customer_reviews.author: The Laings

customer_reviews.title: Not the best Tablet I used
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like it, but in certain area Ipad is better Pros Android Jelly bean platform: I like this feature over Ipad because I am leaning towards one account for all (google account) Screen resolution is pretty good Dislikes: Slower than Ipad Freezes up often Stand/cover accessory: I like Ipad's magnetic cover and stand way better than any available cover for Nexus.
customer_reviews.author: SHIBU T GEORGE

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. But the screen often freezes after an update downloads.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Google Nexus 10
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my college senior, who is about to go to graduate school. She loves it. Great for carrying to classes. Lightweight.... long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Father Kraken

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: This item is excellent, easy to use, works perfectly, there's no doubt about it, if you need this ... Buy it, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: trycak

customer_reviews.title: very good tablet
customer_reviews.text: great quality tablet. starts up very quickly, great resolution. programs and games perform awesome. only drawback I see is the battery drains quick when playing a game, even with the pogo cable
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: EXCELENT
customer_reviews.text: Pros Gorgeous, high-definition display Slick operation and fast processing Sits comfortably in the hand (in landscape mode) Android OS offers lots of flexibility and customisation Cons Jelly Bean 4.2.1 prone to freezes/random reboots Rubber finish might not be to all tastes Connectivity could be better
customer_reviews.author: FRANCISCO MURRIETA

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Much better then the MS Surface for those of us that prefer Android over other platforms. Wish the battery life was a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Lachalle D. Shay

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is just what I wanted. I had previously purchased a smaller cheaper tablet. It just didn't cut it. As the saying goes, you get what you pay for. Screen is large, clear and easy to read. The wifi reception is excellent. Processor is very quick.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Tisza

customer_reviews.title: Great Nexus!
customer_reviews.text: I have been enjoying my Nexus. I am older and somewhat 'electronically impaired' but found the Nexus to be quite understandable to operate. With the help of grandkids and friends I am doing quite well. Slowly but surely, with one more device, they are bringing me up to the 21st Century through this great tablet!
customer_reviews.author: sy

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm new at this using a tablet. Find it pretty easy. It's helping to make life easier. Have told all my friends about it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Stebens

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: I like my new tablet. Works great, feels great, very enjoyable. Works as advertised, I would recommend to anyone looking to buy a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Lae0

customer_reviews.title: Awesome device
customer_reviews.text: Really handy, easy to use, great entertainment for my 2 year old. Even my technology resistant spouse enjoys and uses this tablet, it goes with me everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Izzymagee

customer_reviews.title: Better than my Ipad
customer_reviews.text: This pad has a larger screen and better apps available than my Ipad. The screen has much more vivid colors and the sound quality is also much improved.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: User friendly, easy to setup. Tablet is quite lite and compact easy to store and transport. Would recommend this product to all
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Portner

customer_reviews.title: My Little Sister Loves It.
customer_reviews.text: My Mom Broke My Little Sisters Cheap Tablet, So She Decided To Get Her 1 Of The Better Tablets You Can Get To Surprise Her & It Worked. Great Screen & Sound. She Wont Stop Jumping Up & Down With Joy.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first tablet i have owned and I wonder why I didn't do this sooner! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara V. Whiten

customer_reviews.title: Nexus 10
customer_reviews.text: Android based, excellent reader, all around good tablet, large screen, battery life is good, easy to use and set up. Good gamer too!
customer_reviews.author: Richard "Sid" Frymye

customer_reviews.title: GOT A BOX THAT HAD A BROKEN SEAL
customer_reviews.text: Nothing against the tablet but BEWARE OF THIS SELLER!!!! I got the shipping box, opened it up and found that the product box was beat up, seal was broken and taped up with packing tape. Don't take a chance, I saw a similar comment to this and thought it must have been a fluke. Not the case. FRAUD!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it! Took me many years to get a tablet and now I wish I'd done it earlier! Nice big screen, light weight, great colors.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Peterson

customer_reviews.title: one of the best in 10 inch category
customer_reviews.text: one of the best in 10 inch category very good speakers nice resolution and good battery I like it so much finally it is upgraded to latest Android kitkat with no hassle
customer_reviews.author: Hesham DIAB

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line tablet, great price, quick ship.
customer_reviews.text: Good price, for the best dang tablet I've ever used. I never hardly put it down.
customer_reviews.author: Jim G.

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: first time i bought something electronic online! i was a little hesitant but i am soo satisfied with my purchase! it is excellent, brand new and best of all arrived way before time! :D
customer_reviews.author: huspari

customer_reviews.title: box pre-opened
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to find that the seals on the Google box were broken. Apart from that, the Nexus is a pleasure to use. If you like reading magazines, this is the device to get. My Zinio magazines look great, at least as good if not better than paper. I can't say that for my original iPad.
customer_reviews.author: BlairWare

customer_reviews.title: Google Nexus 10
customer_reviews.text: Google Nexus 10 has worked great right out of the box. The 10 inch screen is very very nice, I am using it more than my smart phone, love the big screen. I hate that product shipped with FEDEX !!!! you can not track FEDEX shipment,then they drop off at post office to sit in your mail box all day. NOT very happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Quick Automatic upgrades - the latest android version Easy file transfer from phone or PC User friendly - easy to navigate Nice design Perfect size for working with docs in PDF
customer_reviews.author: Vilgaile Striuzaite

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: Excelent product, it was in perfect conditions, even though it was used. IIt is fast, small and practical. I am very happy with it, wouldn't change it for any tablet in the market
customer_reviews.author: Jenie

customer_reviews.title: Solid for Google cloud users
customer_reviews.text: Although not perfect, is a great alternative to an iPad, particularly if one is on the Google cloud system. Am enjoying it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Frein

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: it is easy to navigate , easy to see ,clear crisp screen. My husband uses it easier than his desktop computer
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: First attempt transitioning from Windows to Android - not painless but it does get easier the more you use it. Setup was simple - best part it took minutes to get up and running not the hours it takes to setup Windows. Mr. Gates better watch his back. I have no doubt it won't be long before my laptop starts collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far. A case would have made it easier to handle and not smudge the screen.
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it but it is awkward . I should have ordered a case with it. A case would have made it easier to handle and not smudge the screen.
customer_reviews.author: retireddave
